summary: Logo design project: create a bold, unique typographic logo with a color palette that feels young and forward-thinking and supports brand growth.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Update to a bold, unique, youthful, forward-thinking typographic logo style with a growth-oriented color treatment (premium-logo-horizontal-lightblue.dim_512x128.png > bold-youthful-logo-horizontal.dim_512x128.png)
- Update to a matching bold, unique icon-style logo mark suitable for small sizes (premium-logo-icon-lightblue.dim_256x256.png > bold-youthful-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png)
- Update to a matching bold, unique wide logo lockup suitable for social sharing previews (ocean-empowerer-solutions-logo-lightblue.dim_512x256.png > bold-youthful-logo-social.dim_512x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a new typographic logo design for “Ocean Empowerer Solutions” that uses a bold, unique font style and a color treatment that feels young, forward-thinking, and growth-oriented, while remaining highly legible at small sizes.

Update the frontend to use the new logo assets everywhere the brand logo appears by updating frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts and any remaining hardcoded logo references (e.g., social meta tags in frontend/index.html) to point to the new generated filenames.
Ensure the newly generated logo image files are included as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and that the app builds and renders without broken image links.

new_feature_requests.summary: Design a logo with a bold, unique font; select colors that convey youth and forward-thinking while supporting a growth-focused brand.

projectName: Refresh brand logo to a bold, youthful, forward-thinking typographic style
